uk.ac.cam.caret.sakai.rwiki.component.service.impl

Class XSLTEntityHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • uk.ac.cam.caret.sakai.rwiki.component.service.impl.BaseEntityHandlerImpl
      • uk.ac.cam.caret.sakai.rwiki.component.service.impl.XSLTEntityHandler
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    EntityHandler
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    XLSTChangesHandler

    public class XSLTEntityHandler
extends BaseEntityHandlerImpl
    Provides a XSLT Based entity handler. It will serialise the an RWikiObject into XML and then apply a XSLT to generate the Whole output.
    Author:
    ieb
